title: Stage Lv5-P2-S09
description: Level 5 grammar practice focusing on stage-specific patterns and expressions.
examples: Having finished the project, we took a break.
Given his experience, he will succeed.
learning_points: Level 5 target grammar and expressions with practical usage examples

sentences.en: Having finished the project, we took a break.
Given his experience, he will succeed.
Considering the weather, the event was a success.

sentences.kr: 모든 준비를 마쳤으므로 시작할 수 있습니다.
sentences.en: Having completed all preparations, we can start.
Considering the circumstances, we did our best.

sentences.kr: 충분한 자료를 확보했으므로 결정할 수 있습니다.
sentences.en: Having gathered sufficient data, we can make a decision.
Given the budget, this plan is optimal.
Considering the lack of time, we modified the plan.
